ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You will recognise in their faces the radiance of delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: On their faces you will see the glow of beatitude.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You shall see upon their faces the glow of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You can trace on their faces the joy of their bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You will recognise the freshness of serenity on their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You will recognize in their faces the brightness of delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You will recognize in their faces the brightness of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thou knowest in their faces the radiancy of bliss
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou wilt know in their faces the radiance of delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You will find in their faces the brightness of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thou wilt recognize in their faces the brightness of delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You will perceive in their faces the freshness of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You will recognise in their faces the brightness of delight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and in their faces you shall know the radiance of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You will recognize on their faces the radiance of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:24] You will perceive in their faces the radiancy of bliss, the splendour and beauty of blissfulness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou wilt know) Muhammad (in their faces) the faces of the inhabitants of Paradise (the radiance of delight 740
